text: The NBA All-Star Game is an NBA game in which the best players in the Eastern Conference play with the best players in the Western Conference. The first game started on March 2, 1951 at the Boston Garden. The game is played differently than a normal basketball game, but stick to normal NBA rules. ==Results== Year Result Host arena Host city Game MVP 1951 East 111, West 94 Boston Garden Boston, MA Ed
